storyInfo: After a bizarre dream, reality becomes all the more heartwarming.

attributes.content: Rhodes Island Landship
Outside the Doctor's Office
Zzz... zzz...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hmm...? *Yawn*
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Doctor still isn't back after my sweet little nap?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hmph... Next time, I'll just go right in and put my leave request on the desk.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Why is it that every time I want to take some time off, the Doctor's in a meeting? I wouldn't have agreed to take this assistant job, if I knew temporary or not... Hm...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: My hair's in my eyes... Ugh.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Oh, Doctor—
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: —Doctor?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Why'd you just go into your room without a word... Are you mad? Did I do something wrong...? Hm...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: That can't be right. Probably just didn't see me...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hey! Doctor, I'm over here—
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Where am I?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Platinum finds herself in an Ursus villa, flanked by a mountain and lakes.
There is also a tall tower far off in the distance.
It soars straight through the clouds up above.
What are you doing here, Armorless?
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Oh... The Radiant Knight...?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I could ask you the same.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I work for Rhodes Island too. Of course I can—
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: This isn't Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: I guess you're right.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: So? Where are we? What's with the tower?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: This... is a place for reprieve. As for the tower, you'll have to ask yourself.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Platinum looks at the tower in silence.
It's not easy to make out the tower's features with the bright sunlight reflecting off its surface; it could also be the unfamiliar angle she is looking at the tower from.
Nonetheless, the tower stands there, scraping the skies like a mirage.
The General Chamber of Commerce? Since when is the K.G.C.C. Tower that big?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: We never left.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: And they never changed.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: That doesn't sound like something the Radiant Knight would say.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hmm... Oh, well. I'm only here to look for the Doctor.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: If the Doctor's not here, then you'll have to excuse—
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight doesn't speak. The ever-shining champion simply stands in silence, gazing out at the world.
What do you need the Doctor for...?
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: It's been a while since I came to Rhodes Island. I just want to enjoy some alone time.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Is that so?
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Take that door. You'll find the Doctor there.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: What's this place now?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: A Bolívarian resort town. The climate's just right, and the service is good. It's much comfier than the log cabins up north.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Roy... First the Radiant Knight, and now you?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Oh, come on, you're not happy to see me?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I thought we got along better than that, little Platinum?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Cut loose a little. We're here on vacation. The sun's shining bright, and check out the amazing scenery. Don't let work bum you out.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Relax. Why don't I get you some sweets? A nice dessert is just the right thing for people like us, always working under so much pressure. I'm sure you can agree on that.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Waiter! A raspado for the señorita here!
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: The shaved ice strikes Platinum with a strange, familiar feeling.
The flakes of ice in the cup have been molded into shapes of varying sizes. They've been painted with colorful fruit syrups.
They look just like—
A mountain—
With a private villa?
Spare the unpleasant thoughts while you're on vacation. It's there, and you can't do anything about that.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Or are you saying you'll get distracted as long as it's there?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: What's the point of having that long vacation you finally managed to get approved, then?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Maybe you should head back and take care of things first. Take a real holiday after that. What do you say?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Take care of... what?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: You'll have to ask yourself that.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: No worries. Leave all the other troublesome things to me.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: You might want to hurry, though.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Roy points at a spot of light in the distance.
Everyone's got something they're afraid of, after all.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Platinum looks into the distance. There are three Darksteel arrows bound together as one, blazing through the sky as they let out a sharp howl.

The arrows are fast, but also not that fast. They are so fast that they will pierce through Platinum's body the next second, but they are also so slow that they are no match for the pedestrians' leisurely pace.
You know your way back to the Grand Knight Territory, don't you?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: That's good.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I think you looked better with black hair.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Before the flabbergasted Roy can even let out half a chuckle, Platinum has already turned around and dived into the water.
She's not the tiniest bit interested in Roy's reaction. She simply wanted to say it.
She has pondered for a long time.
Miss Centaurea. Miss Centaurea?
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Something the matter?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Would you be interested in trying out for the knight preliminaries?
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Platinum ignores the knight scout following close behind and dashes toward the General Chamber of Commerce Tower.
She imagined the K.G.C.C. building as crowded as the Grand Knight Territory.
But all she sees is statues. All kinds of statue. All pure white, color unadulterated.
The receptionist at the front desk, the security guard at the door, and the staff members walking down the hallway...
All of them are frozen in some unknown time.
Well, this sucks. I don't have access to the part of the building where the directors hang out.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The elevator doors aren't opening, and there's no taking the stairs. The secret passages are sealed shut, too.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Light floods into the building through the ceiling in the center, illuminating the entire atrium with an unnaturally bright glow.
If I recall correctly... I'm a pegasus?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Platinum looks at the sky above her and leaps upward.
Contrary to what she expected, she doesn't immediately fall to the ground. Instead, she rises higher and higher, accelerating as she goes, toward the ends of the light.
The warm sunlight slowly envelops her—
Followed by the advent of darkness.
Platinum! You can't sleep here!
Mm... Sorry...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: {@nickname}, do you know what I went through to find you?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.options: You sure had it rough, having to sleep on the floor.

attributes.content: Grr.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: You saw nothing. Got it?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.options: I literally just woke you up. How could I—

attributes.content: No, you saw nothing. Got? It?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Oh, whatever.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.options: Let's see... A leave application form?

attributes.content: I want to take a long vacation... Get away from Rhodes Island and go somewhere far to... yeah... let off some steam.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: You'll let me do that, right?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I didn't think of that, Doctor... Did you want to come with me on my trip? Well, we're both here right now. Might as well—
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Uhh... What do you mean by that? Like the coming part, or are you just approving my time off?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Um, I need time to pack, at least.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.options: Sheesh. Do you know how long you've put off this tiny wish of yours?

attributes.content: W-Wait—Don't pull—
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: She blinks her eyes, only to find before her the thing she's most familiar with—also the thing that she dreads the most.
Another phone call... *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Now we'll never hear from—
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The moment after she smashes the phone into pieces, she finds it restored to pristine condition, ringing yet again.
Can't you quiet down a little?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: There's no end to this...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: (Picks up the phone)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hello?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Platinum, you're overstepping your boundaries.
Right. Yes, I am so terribly sorry.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: And?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The General Chamber of Commerce's authority is not for you to trample upon like so.
Oh.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: (Sets the phone receiver aside)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Okay, get it all off your chest.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Go on. I'll chill here for a bit.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hm, if I recall correctly, there should be some booze here.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Aha, I knew it...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: (Uncorks the bottle)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: (Pours half a glass)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Mmm.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Darksteel arrows are growing bigger and bigger under Kazimierz's night sky.
They blitz through the night like shooting stars. Even the million lights illuminating the Grand Knight Territory cannot shroud their luminance.
Is this... sparkling water?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: So they drink more than just wine? Hmm... Okay. I'm not a big fan of their booze anyway...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: (Pours half a glass of sparkling water)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: To Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: This one's for me, and for you.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: (Pours the sparkling water on the phone)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The moment the water touches the phone, an intense tirade can be heard blaring out of its receiver, but as soon as the glass has been emptied of the sparkling water, there is a brief buzz, and the phone falls silent once again.
So... What will happen when the arrow pierces the tower?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: You seem to be looking forward to something.
Malkiewicz. What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Long time no see, Platinum.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I've always been here.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I can answer your question.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: 'What will happen when the arrow pierces the tower?'
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Nothing will happen.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Oh, this suuucks. How come I'm getting you and the Doctor mixed up in my dream?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: We don't control our own dreams, Centaurea.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I can be anyone.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: I can be someone you are afraid of.
I can be someone you pity.
I can be someone who you show an interest in.
Together, we form that place you can never leave behind—the very place you dread—the tower.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: You grew up there. It was your future. You ran from it, and you still feel as though you have nowhere to go. You are confused and helpless.
attributes.name: Czarny

attributes.content: The tower...?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Without a single word, Platinum gazes at the dreamscape.
Right as he makes his proclamation, the ceiling starts to open outward, revealing the uppermost level of the General Chamber building.
There are no seats or telephones there.
Only branches extending endlessly into the night sky like those of a tree. At the rate they are growing, the branches will one day engulf even the sun and moon.
Each branch is fabricated from different materials.
Steel, newspapers, wood, and grain.
The different materials all merge into one.
Of the different branches, there is a particular one full of thorns and arrowheads that lets out a sharp roar as it blazes past the winds.
Platinum feels as though she is standing on the head of a giant beast, its wings spread toward the skies, its roots dug deep into the earth.
Its skeleton is welded together from different materials, and all kinds of currency flow within its veins.
As for Platinum herself, she was once an insignificant cell of this beast.
But what about now?
You might be right, Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: But––
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: —I refuse.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Platinum thinks to herself the name of a certain person before she crashes through the window pane and leaps downward.
I hope we never see each other again, Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I want a new life, you know?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Oww...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Oh, you caught me, huh?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I knew you had it in you. I knew I could count on you. And this isn't the first time either, am I right?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: So, where are we?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: {@nickname}?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: So there are some things you don't know.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: What a surprise.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Oh, don't set me down just yet. I'm not really in the mood to move. Let's put an end to this messed up dream already.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Actually, since it's a dream, it's not like you have anything to lose. Hold me for a little longer.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I need to focus and clear my head.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I need to get all that weird Kazimierz stuff wiped clean from my brain.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I'm listening. Go on.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hello, Doctor.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: You're in a good mood. Did something nice happen?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.options: What's wrong? Why are you taking a nap in front of my office?;You're finally awake. Did you need me for something?

attributes.content: Nothing special.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I just realized something. It's actually pretty easy to tell dreams and reality apart.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Anyway, here.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.options: A leave application?;......;Again? How many times does that make this month?

attributes.content: You can just deny it. Whatever.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: But anyway, I have something else I want to ask you.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.options: Uhh... Let's start with that one first.;What is it this time?

attributes.content: Do you... have some free time right now?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: {@nickname}?
attributes.name: Platinum
